```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(MASS)
library(randomForest)
library(MLmetrics)
library(MASS)
library(mclust)
library(ClustMMDD)
```

```{r}
m1_full <- read_csv("m1_full.csv")
m2_full <- read_csv("m2_full.csv")
```

```{r}
m1_scaled <- scale(m1_full)
m2_scaled <- scale(m2_full)
```

```{r}
km1 <- kmeans(m1_scaled, 3)
km2 <- kmeans(m2_scaled, 3)
km3 <- kmeans(m1_scaled, 5)
km4 <- kmeans(m2_scaled, 5)
```

```{r}
bt1 <- km1$betweenss/km1$totss

bt1
```

```{r}
bt2 <- km2$betweenss/km2$totss

bt2
```

```{r}
bt3 <- km3$betweenss/km3$totss

bt3
```

```{r}
bt4 <- km4$betweenss/km4$totss

bt4
```
